snippet: Clothing design inspires the works of furniture makers, weavers, jewelry artists and others, many of whom will display their wares at fairs and exhibitions throughout May.
abstract: NYCxDesign, weeklong, five-borough festival, provides wide variety of designs and mediums for both amateur and professional interior designer to explore.
lead_paragraph: Clothing design inspires the works of furniture makers, weavers, jewelry artists and others, many of whom will display their wares at fairs and exhibitions throughout May.

headline.main: From Runway to Runner: The Crossover Appeal of Fashion Trends
